Header.title: The All-in-one solution for your clinic
Header.paragraph: Try our program today, sign up for account from the login link below

About.paragraph: IDoctor is a simple application for record management that runs anywhere from everywhere
Why: Any OS - Window, Mac, IOS/Iphone, Android
No lengthy installation. Can work as a website or an App on phone/device.
Built with latest technologies that allow it runs mostly offline, without constant internet connection.
Why2: All your data stored on cloud and auto sync between devices
Very fast and Simple to use. Provide suggestion and auto calculation
Reviewed by multiple doctors with different background and sub-speciality

Services.name: Cloud Storage
Services.text: No worries about lost of database anymore

Testimonials.text: "Love how it works from any device, I can add data from my phone quickly and see it in my computer right away"
Testimonials.name: John Doe

Testimonials.text: "They take feedback and build in customization to my need"
Testimonials.name: Robert Adams
